message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our previous customers. I believe it could be a great asset for you as well. For this exceptional opportunity, I am offering it to you for $120. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $90 for it. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.
